articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Joanna Prout
articles.contents:
Joanna Prout
          
          
            
              
              Bio
              Joanna was a social worker and clinical psychologist for children and families before falling in love with evaluation.
              Now she enjoys figuring out how to measure things that are difficult to pin down, like whether educational and behavioral health interventions are happening the way we thought and having the impact we hoped.
              She has been learning R to help clean and manage messy ‘real world’ data and create visualizations that are easy to understand and engaging.
              
              
              Education
              West Virginia University | Morgantown, WV
              Ph.D. in Clinical Psychology | August 2008 - August 2014
              The University of Pittsburgh | Pittsburgh, PA
              M.S.W. in Direct Clinical Practice | August 2004 - May 2006
              The University of Pittsburgh | Pittsburgh, PA
              B.S. in Psychology and English Writing | August 2000 - May 2004
              
              
              Experience
              University of Maryland School of Medicine | Research Manager | April 2020 - Present
              University of Maryland School of Medicine | Research Supervisor | April 2015 - March 2020
